attributes.title: don’t download!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our fearless president and find ways I could help to Keep America Great🇱🇷but had one of the worst experiences with an app in my life. It kept lagging and glitching. I think it bugged my phone. I then attempted to delete it and was met with an error message! I wouldn’t recommend. Awful app.

attributes.title: I miss you truck :’(
attributes.review:
Downloading this app is bad luck. The second I downloaded it to keep up with my fave president Donald Trash, my pet bald eagle called “Pick up truck” died instantly!
I miss Pick up Truck every day!

attributes.title: don’t download!!!!
attributes.review: when i downloaded this app roaches crawled out of my speaker and my grandma died instantly after downloading it😿😖😭

attributes.title: do NOT download
attributes.review: this app continuously asked me for my social security number. i gave it to them and what happend? the app HACKED my microwave and it exploded 😡 my parents also had a seizure because are house was destroyed, and we tried the rebuild it with my 2013 legos >:(

attributes.title: BAD BAD BAD
attributes.review: This app is the worst app I have ever seen! Quite a blasphemy!! I don’t quite know how I got here but all I can say is this app should be named the worst of all time! I now have viruses and can’t turn on my phone anymore. Very sad. I am trying to piece myself back together after this horrid “app” but I honestly don’t know if I can do it. It left a hole so deep inside my heart. Trump is trying to ban Tiktok, don’t let him do it!! Please! Tiktok is a creative outlet for millions of people including myself. I don’t care who you are, if you support trump, you are racist, sexist, homophobic, and misogynistic among many other horrible things. Trump messed with the wrong generation. We will continue to fight forever. Black lives matter!!✊✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈
